title: (x) Guggenheim Museum - custom typeface {Mark S}
content: That's a custom font designed by Jonathan Hoefler.
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content: Thanks, those are all great suggestions!... I completely forgot about Neutraface! It's actually perfect for this project. One of my all-time favorites... I also have a cyrilic project to work on... Journal Sans is a real possibility...
